data.title: Hollyoaks confirms John Paul McQueen and Craig Dean are back together
data.meta_description: McDean was one of the most iconic couples of the Channel 4 soap's history
data.text:
Hollyoaks has had some very iconic couples over the years - but none more so than John-Paul McQueen and Craig Dean AKA McDean.

As far as viewers knew, the couple, played by James Sutton and Guy Burnet, were separated - as John-Paul returned a single man during his most recent time in the soap.

John-Paul's final scenes aired in March this year, leaving fans wondering whether he'd ever get back with Craig as he fled to Singapore with his son Matthew, as he got a call from his ex.

And it's finally been confirmed they're together - with a very subtle hint.

It was Craig's mum Frankie Osborne's funeral this week, and it was revealed Craig couldn't make the funeral because he was in Singapore.

Eagle-eyed viewers soon put two and two together, taking to Twitter to share their joy.

One said: "McDean basically just got confirmed! Love that!"

Another added: "Well I guess that's confirmation John Paul did answer Craig's call..."

A third shared: "OMG Craig's in Singapore!!! #Hollyoaks #Mcdean ."

While this could've been wishful thinking from McDean fans, Hollyoaks confirmed the news with a reply to a fan saying: "Good spot!"

It remains to be seen whether Craig and John-Paul will return to Hollyoaks village together in the future.

*Hollyoaks is on E4 weekdays at 7pm
